# skinvaults.online llms.txt

- [SkinVaults - CS2 Skin Analytics & Inventory Management](https://www.skinvaults.online): A platform for tracking and managing Counter-Strike 2 (CS2) skin inventory, providing real-time price tracking, analytics, and trading tools.
- [My Inventory - Track Your CS2 Skin Collection | SkinVaults](https://www.skinvaults.online/inventory): View and manage your complete CS2 skin inventory, track collection value, and get detailed analytics for traders and collectors.
- [My Wishlist - Save Your Favorite CS2 Skins | SkinVaults](https://www.skinvaults.online/wishlist): Create and manage your CS2 skin wishlist to save favorites, track prices, and receive price drop notifications.
- [Pro Subscription - Unlock Advanced CS2 Analytics | SkinVaults](https://www.skinvaults.online/pro): Upgrade to SkinVaults Pro for advanced CS2 skin analytics, faster price scanning, and exclusive features to enhance your CS2 skin trading experience.
- [Compare CS2 Skins - Side-by-Side Skin Comparison | SkinVaults](https://www.skinvaults.online/compare): Compare CS2 skins side-by-side to make informed trading decisions.
- [SkinVaults - CS2 Skin Analytics & Inventory Management](https://www.skinvaults.online/shop): The ultimate CS2 skin analytics and inventory management platform for tracking Steam inventory value, monitoring skin prices, and making informed trading decisions.
- [SkinVaults - CS2 Skin Analytics & Inventory Management](https://www.skinvaults.online/contact): A platform for tracking and managing CS2 skin inventory, providing real-time price tracking, analytics, and trading tools for collectors and investors.
